com.lucidworks.fusion.connector.plugin.api.security

Class SecurityFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lucidworks.fusion.connector.plugin.api.security.SecurityFilter

  • public class SecurityFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents arbitrary Solr security filter applied at query time.

    Consists of main clause/query and multiple "local param" queries.

    For more information how to build complex hierarchical Solr queries see Solr Wiki
